revision.text: Possibly: An Enquiry into the use and Practice of juries among the Greeks and Romans; From whence the Origin of the English Jury may probably be deduced. In Three Parts. By John Pettingal, D.D. Fellow of the Society of Antiquaries of London. (London : Printed for the Author, by W. and W. Strahan; And sold by T. Cadell, (Successor to Mr. Millar) in the Strand, MDCCLXIX. [1769]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2511869~S1
